title: New Year 's resolution of Americans for 2018
summary: A survey conducted in 2018 reveals that the largest groups of Italian respondents cheated on for Learn_a_new_skill_or_hobby either Year a Save_money or Year a Lose_weight_or_get_in_shape .

However , it was common to Americans Year strangers as well .
